languages.text: "Благодарю за содействие, Вольный Торговец! Абордажная группа захватила мерзавку ван дер Ройсен, ее... перевоспитанием я займусь лично. Возможно, бедняжка просто попала под дурное влияние. Впрочем, как и было обещано — награда за ее поимку ваша. Помимо того, я прилагаю особо ценный трофей — как персональную благодарность".
languages.translation_comment:
Спикер — PiratesVsNavy_admiral_name
Выдаем ПФ
Выдаем репу Флота
Выдаем наградной итем (другой)

Спикер — PiratesVsNavy_admiral_name
Выдаем ПФ
Выдаем репу Флота
Выдаем наградной итем (другой)

languages.text: "Thank you for your cooperation, Rogue Trader. The boarding party has captured van der Roycen. Perhaps the poor girl has simply fallen under a bad influence, and so I will personally see to her... re-education. The reward for her capture is yours as promised. In addition, I am enclosing a particularly valuable trophy as a token of my sincerest gratitude."
languages.original_text: "Благодарю за содействие, Вольный Торговец! Абордажная группа захватила мерзавку ван дер Ройсен, ее... перевоспитанием я займусь лично. Возможно, бедняжка просто попала под дурное влияние. Впрочем, как и было обещано — награда за ее поимку ваша. Помимо того, я прилагаю особо ценный трофей — как персональную благодарность".

traits.locale_text: "Thank you for your cooperation, Rogue Trader. The boarding party has captured Princess van der Roysen. Perhaps the poor girl has simply fallen under a bad influence, I will... personally see to her reeducation. The reward for her capture is yours as promised. In addition, I am enclosing a particularly valuable trophy as a token of my personal gratitude."

languages.text: "Danke für Eure Kooperation, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Das Enterkommando hat van der Roycen festgesetzt. Vielleicht stand das arme Mädchen nur unter einem schlechten Einfluss. Ich werde mich persönlich um ihre ... Umerziehung kümmern. Die Belohnung für ihre Ergreifung gehört wie versprochen Euch. Außerdem überlasse ich Euch eine besonders wertvolle Trophäe als Zeichen meiner aufrichtigen Dankbarkeit."
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your cooperation, Rogue Trader. The boarding party has captured van der Roycen. Perhaps the poor girl has simply fallen under a bad influence, and so I will personally see to her... re-education. The reward for her capture is yours as promised. In addition, I am enclosing a particularly valuable trophy as a token of my sincerest gratitude."

traits.locale_text: "Danke für Eure Kooperation, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Das Enterkommando hat van der Roycen festgesetzt. Vielleicht stand das arme Mädchen nur unter einem schlechten Einfluss. Ich werde mich persönlich um ihre ... Umerziehung kümmern. Die Belohnung für ihre Ergreifung gehört wie versprochen Euch. Außerdem überlasse ich Euch eine besonders wertvolle Trophäe als Zeichen meiner aufrichtigen Dankbarkeit."

languages.text: « Merci pour votre coopération, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Le groupe d'abordage a capturé van der Roycen. Peut-être cette pauvre fille est-elle simplement tombée sous la coupe d'une mauvaise influence, aussi vais-je veiller personnellement à sa... rééducation. La récompense offerte pour son arrestation est à vous, comme promis, et j'y ajoute également un précieux trophée en gage de reconnaissance. »
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your cooperation, Rogue Trader. The boarding party has captured van der Roycen. Perhaps the poor girl has simply fallen under a bad influence, and so I will personally see to her... re-education. The reward for her capture is yours as promised. In addition, I am enclosing a particularly valuable trophy as a token of my sincerest gratitude."

traits.locale_text: « Merci pour votre coopération, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Le groupe d'abordage a capturé van der Roycen. Peut-être cette pauvre fille est-elle simplement tombée sous la coupe d'une mauvaise influence, aussi vais-je veiller personnellement à sa... rééducation. La récompense offerte pour son arrestation est à vous, comme promis, et j'y ajoute également un précieux trophée en gage de reconnaissance. »

languages.text: «Gracias por la cooperación, Comerciante Independiente. El grupo de abordaje ya ha capturado a van der Roycen. Tal vez la pobre chica haya caído en malas compañías, así que supervisaré personalmente su... reeducación. La recompensa por su captura es suya, como había prometido. Además, como muestra de mi sincero agradecimiento, he incluido un trofeo especialmente valioso».
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your cooperation, Rogue Trader. The boarding party has captured van der Roycen. Perhaps the poor girl has simply fallen under a bad influence, and so I will personally see to her... re-education. The reward for her capture is yours as promised. In addition, I am enclosing a particularly valuable trophy as a token of my sincerest gratitude."

traits.locale_text: «Gracias por la cooperación, Comerciante Independiente. El grupo de abordaje ya ha capturado a van der Roycen. Tal vez la pobre chica haya caído en malas compañías, así que supervisaré personalmente su... reeducación. La recompensa por su captura es suya, como había prometido. Además, como muestra de mi sincero agradecimiento, he incluido un trofeo especialmente valioso».

languages.text: 「ご協力ありがとうございます、ローグトレーダー。乗り込み部隊がファン・デル・ロイセンを捕らえました。あの哀れな少女は、きっと悪い影響下に置かれていたのでしょう。ですから私が直々に彼女の…さ、再教育をいたしましょう。彼女の捕獲に対する報奨金は、お約束通りあなたのものです。さらに、心からの感謝のしるしとして、特に貴重な戦利品を同封します」
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your cooperation, Rogue Trader. The boarding party has captured van der Roycen. Perhaps the poor girl has simply fallen under a bad influence, and so I will personally see to her... re-education. The reward for her capture is yours as promised. In addition, I am enclosing a particularly valuable trophy as a token of my sincerest gratitude."

traits.locale_text: 「ご協力ありがとうございます、ローグトレーダー。乗り込み部隊がファン・デル・ロイセンを捕らえました。あの哀れな少女は、きっと悪い影響下に置かれていたのでしょう。ですから私が直々に彼女の…さ、再教育をいたしましょう。彼女の捕獲に対する報奨金は、お約束通りあなたのものです。さらに、心からの感謝のしるしとして、特に貴重な戦利品を同封します」

languages.text: “感谢您的合作，行商浪人。我的登舰部队抓住了冯·德·罗伊森。或许那个可怜的姑娘只是被人带坏了，所以我要亲自对她进行……重新教育。正如我之前答应的那样，她的赏金都属于您。另外，我还随信附赠了一件非常珍贵的纪念品，代表我最诚挚的谢意。”
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your cooperation, Rogue Trader. The boarding party has captured van der Roycen. Perhaps the poor girl has simply fallen under a bad influence, and so I will personally see to her... re-education. The reward for her capture is yours as promised. In addition, I am enclosing a particularly valuable trophy as a token of my sincerest gratitude."

traits.locale_text: “感谢您的合作，行商浪人。我的登舰部队抓住了冯·德·罗伊森。或许那个可怜的姑娘只是被人带坏了，所以我要亲自对她进行……重新教育。正如我之前答应的那样，她的赏金都属于您。另外，我还随信附赠了一件非常珍贵的纪念品，代表我最诚挚的谢意。”

languages.text: "İş birliğiniz için teşekkür ederim Hür Tacir. Bordalama ekibi, van der Roycen'ı yakaladı. Belki zavallı kız, yalnızca kötü birinin etkisine maruz kalmıştır. Yeniden... Eğitimiyle bizzat ilgileneceğim. Yakalama ödülü, söz verdiğimiz üzere size ait. Ödüllere ek olarak minnettarlığımı tüm samimiyetimle belirtmek için bilhassa değerli bir ganimet de ekledim."
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your cooperation, Rogue Trader. The boarding party has captured van der Roycen. Perhaps the poor girl has simply fallen under a bad influence, and so I will personally see to her... re-education. The reward for her capture is yours as promised. In addition, I am enclosing a particularly valuable trophy as a token of my sincerest gratitude."
